about_the_game:
Litterbugs are trashing the planet, and it's time to for it to end!


Headbox Games, in association with the Gambler 500 and Sons of Smokey, needs your help to save the planet! No one knows exactly where these toxic monsters came from, but you'll discover the sinister plot while you run and drive your way through this open world action game.

As a member of the Gambler 500, a volunteer organization that has removed over 4 million pounds of trash from public lands, you will embark on a quest to solve the trash problem once and for all.

  • Play how you want!
    Do whatever you want in this open world game, with multiple climates based on the Pacific Northwest. Forests, snow, and dunes await you as you travel by foot or vehicle across the landscape.
  • Real cars and real people!
    Wild vehicles and their owners were 3D scanned to be NPCs in the game. From social media influencers to local mechanics, every NPC you see is a real human somewhere on planet earth.
  • Fun for the whole family!
    Yes you can die and get covered in bug guts, but there are no drugs, alcohol, or firearms in the game. Everything is silly fun for all ages.
  • Unique Side Quests!
    Completing a mission can unlock a vehicle, and you can test out the performance at real-world "HooptieX" race tracks. Compare your lap times between a lifted economy car and an armored up roadster. Take a minibike ride through narrow trails not accessible by trucks. Or enjoy a mountaintop view while helping restore a radio station. This missions have a wide variety.
  • Customize your character!
    Venture into dangerous territory with style when you find items like sunglasses, hats, backpacks, and more. Find a new racing helmet or a fancy fanny pack.
  • Spectacular Effects!
    This is not a simulation. Enjoy wild weapons and toxic creatures like you've never seen before.

content_descriptors.notes: K!ll All Litterbugs is a 3rd person game that uses vehicles and a variety of weapons to kill monsters.  Players can aim the weapons for a closer and more accurate view of the combat.  Combat is accompanied by frequent explosions and sprays of blood as the monsters are destroyed.  The game environment can depict wreckage of vehicles and destroyed monsters.  The player character can be killed by the monsters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 20H2)
  • Processor: Six-Core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or later for Raytracing
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
